location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, British Envoy to Persia, to John [James] Dow

mods.abstract: In his letter, Willock acknowledges receipt of Bruce's dispatch dated 7 February 1820. He informs Dow that the packet was delivered, and requests Dow to forward important dispatches to Major General Sir William Keir. He finishes his letter by giving the terms of payment for the bearer of his letter.
